title: He Thought It Was On And Poppin
itunes:title: He Thought It Was On And Poppin
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m married and in my mid-forties and my husband turns 40 in a month. He decided he was going to have a guys’ weekend in Mexico and then he would come back and we would celebrate together with a small group of our friends. He got his little plans together and I was watching all of the emails going back and forth........................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
